attributes.action: Give a reduced curriculum to students in year 10 and 12 sitting exams in 2022
attributes.additional_details: I believe that due to the current situation students due to sit the next set of exams have missed enough school to the point where a regular set of gcse and a level exams will find it impossible to meet their predicted grades. We should be tested on a fair set of knowledge that we have learnt over a realistic period of time rather than stressing and further damaging mental health by trying to learn such a wide range of content in a reduced and limited time frame.
attributes.background: I think the education secretary should alter the exams meant to be sat in 2022 with a reduced curriculum so that students are able to meet an actually achieveable target grade and get exam results they can actually go forward in life being happy with

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the following petition:

Reduce content for 2022 A-level and GCSE exams
